title: Reversible solid bromine complexation into Ti3C2Tx MXene carriers: a highly active electrode for bromine-based flow batteries with ultralow self-discharge
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00580E, Paper
Open Access

Luyin Tang, Tianyu Li, Wenjing Lu, Xianfeng Li
The robust and reversible solid bromine complexation effect was incorporated into electrodes, endowing bromine-based flow batteries with ultralow self-discharge.
